<!--StartFragment-->

<h1 align="center" style="text-align:center"><span style="font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件是数据的集合体，对文件的处理过程就是对文件的读写过程，或输入输出过程。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所谓文件是指内存以外的媒体上以某种形式组织的一组相关数据的有序集合。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件分类：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">顺序文件，随机文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文本文件和二进制文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文本文件也称为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ASCII</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">文件，在磁盘中存放时每个字符对应一个字节，用于存放对应的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ASCII</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">码。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文本文件可以在屏幕上按字符显示，源程序文件就是文本文件，由于是按字符显示，所以能读懂文件内容。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">二进制文件是按二进制编码方式来存放的。这里主要讨论文件的打开，关闭，读，写，定位等操作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件的存取方法</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">程序的输入输出（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）有两种方式：一种称为标准</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">或流式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，另一种称为低级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。流式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是依靠标准库函数中的输入输出函数实现的。低级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">利用操作系统提供的接口函数（称为底层接口或系统调用）实现输入输出，低级</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">I/O</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">主要提供系统软件使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">语言中用一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">类型的指针变量指向一个文件，（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">类型是系统在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stdio.h</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">中定义的描述已打开文件的一种结构类型），这个指针称为文件指针。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">指针变量标识符；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *fp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件的打开与关闭</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所谓打开文件，指的是建立文件的各种有关信息，并使文件指针指向该文件，以便对它进行操作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">关闭文件则是断开指针与文件之间的联系，也就禁止再对该文件进行操作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">1、</span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fopen<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数原型：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *fopen(const char *filename,const char
*mode);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fopen</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数用来打开一个文件，前一部分用来说明文件路径及文件名，后一部分</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">mode</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">指出了打开文件的存取方式；返回值是被打开文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">型指针，若打开失败，则返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">NULL</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。打开文件的语法格式如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件指针名</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">=fopen</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">（文件名，使用文件方式）；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件指针名必须被说明为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">类型的指针变量。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *fp</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fp=fopen(“C:\\Windowss\\abc.txt”,”r”);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">注意用两个反斜杠</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><a href="file:///%E6%9D%A5%E8%A1%A8%E7%A4%BA%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95%E9%97%B4%E7%9A%84%E9%97%B4%E9%9A%94%E7%AC%A6">\\<span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">来表示目录间的间隔符</span></a></span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">存取文件的模式是一个字符串，可以由字母</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">r,w,a,t,b</span><span style="font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">及</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">+</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">组合而成，各字符的含义如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">r(read)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">w(write)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">a(append):</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">追加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">b(binary)</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">二进制文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">t(text)</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文本文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">+</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">：读和写（随机）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">在打开一个文件时如果出错，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fopen</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">将返回一个空指针值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">NULL</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。所以可以用一下程序段打开文件：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">If((fp=fopen(“c:\\work2”,”rb”))==NULL)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:12.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">{<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:12.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">   …/*</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">错误处理</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">*/<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="text-indent:12.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">}<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">注意：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">B</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">t</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">不能同时存在，且打开文本文件时可以省略</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">t</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）用“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">r</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">”打开一个文件时，该文件必须已经存在，且只能从该文件读数据。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）用“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">w</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">“打开一个文件时只能向该文件写数据。若打开的文件不存在，则以指定的文件名建立该文件；若打开的文件已经存在，则将该文件删除，重建一个新文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）用“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">a</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">“方式打开文件时文件必须是存在的，否则将会出错。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fclose<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数原型：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> int fclose(FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">参数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fopen</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">打开的文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">指针。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fcolse</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">使缓冲区中所有未写到磁盘或其他输出设备中的数据无条件输出到磁盘中，并回收系统分配的输入输出缓冲区，切断</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">指针与文件之间的联系。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件一旦使用完毕，应当用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fclose</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数把文件关闭，以免文件的数据丢失。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fclose(</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件指针</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">)</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">正常完成关闭文件操作时，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fcolse</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数返回值为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，出错时返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">EOF</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（值为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">-1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）。对于打开的文件如果未执行过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt">fclose</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，则程序终止运行时将自动调用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fclose</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">关闭所有打开而未关闭的文件。无论按照何种方式打开的文件，当不再使用时应及时调用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fclose</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">关闭。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">常用文件存取函数</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（1）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">字符读写函数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgetc,fputc,getc,putc,ungetc<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（2）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">字符串读写函数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgets,fputs<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（3）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">数据块读写函数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fread,fwrite<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（4）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">格式化读写函数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fscanf,fprintf,sprintf,sscanf<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fread</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fwrite</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数可以用于任何文件的存取，其余函数只能用于文本文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">使用以上函数要求包含头文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stdio.h<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">1、</span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">字符读写函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> fgetc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fputc<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fgetc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数的功能是从指定的文件中读一个字符，函数原型为：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fgetc(FILE
*stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">文件中读取一个字符，并将读取的字符转换为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">int</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">值返回，遇到文件结束或出错时返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">EOF</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。参数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是已经打开的输入文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">指针。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Ch=fgetc(fp);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">注意：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">读取的文件必须是以读或者读写方式打开的文件。在文件内部有一个位置指针，用来指向文件的当前读写位置，在文件打开时，该指针总是指向文件的第一个字节。使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgetc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数后，该位置指针向后移动一个字节。因此可以连续多次使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgetc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数，读取多个字符。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">写字符函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fputc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">的功能是把一个字符写入指定的文件中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fputc(int c,FILE
*stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">其中，参数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">c</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是要输出的数据，可以是字符或者字符的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt">ASCII</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">码，返回值是被写的字符，出错时返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">EOF</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fputc</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（‘</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">a’</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fp</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">2、</span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">字符串读写函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgets</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fputs<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">读字符串函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fgets<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Char *fgets(char
*s,int n, FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">其功能是从指定的文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">中读一个字符串到字符数组</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">s</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">中。其中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是一个正整数，表示从文件中读出的字符串不超过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n-1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">个字符。在读入的最后一个字符后将自动加上字符串结束标志‘</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">\0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">‘。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fgets(str,n,fp)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fp</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">所指的文件中读出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n-1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">个字符送入字符数组</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">str</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">需要注意一下几点：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（1）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">在读出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n-1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">个字符之前如果遇到了换行符或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">EOF</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">，则结束读取。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:36.0pt;text-indent:-36.0pt;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;
tab-stops:list 36.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体">（2）<span style="font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fgets</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数也有返回值，其返回值是字符数组的首地址，一般不需要使用该返回值。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">写字符串函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fputs</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">的函数原型：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fputs(const
char *s,FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">其功能是向指定的文件写入一个字符串，其中字符串可以是字符串常量，也可以是字符数组名或指针变量。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fputs(“swimming”,fp);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">其意义是把字符串“</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">swimming</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">”写入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fp</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所指的文件中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">3、</span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">数据块读写函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fread</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fwrite<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">实际应用中常常需要把一组数据写到文件中或者从文件中读到内存中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">语言提供了用于整块数据读写的函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt">fread</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fwrite</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。如果每次读或写一组数据，则每个数据项的长度应相同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fread(void*ptr,size,n,FILE
*stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fwrite(const void
*ptr,size,n,FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fread</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">中读取</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">个大小为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">size</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">的数据项到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ptr</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所指向的内存单元，返回值是读到的数据项的数目；返回值小于等于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。参数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ptr</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是存放输入数据的内存缓冲区地址；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">size</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是每个数据项的大小；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是输入数据项的个数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fwrite </span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">将由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ptr</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所指向的内存单元中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">个大小为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">size</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">的数据项写入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">所指向的文件，返回值是写入的数据项的数目，返回值小于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。参数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">ptr</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是存放要输出的数据的缓冲区地址，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">size</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是每个输出数据项的大小，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">n</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是要输出的数据项个数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fread(fa,4,5,fp);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fp</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">所指的文件中，每次读取</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">个字节（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">个实数）送入实数数组</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fa</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">中，连续读取</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">次，即读</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">个实数到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fa</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">4、</span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">格式化读写函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fscanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fprintf<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fscanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fprintf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数与前面使用的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">scanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">printf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数功能相似。都是格式化读写函数，但</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fscanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fprintf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数读写的对象不是键盘和显示器，而是磁盘文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fscanf (FILE
*stream,const char *format,…);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fprintf(FILE
*stream,const char *format,…);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fscanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是格式输入函数，除必须给出输入文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">指针，其余参数及函数功能完全与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt">scanf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">相同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fprintf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">是格式化输出函数，除必须给出输出文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">指针外，其余参数与函数功能与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">printf</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">相同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left:18.0pt;text-indent:-18.0pt;mso-list:l3 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list 18.0pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"">5、</span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">其他有关函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">在头文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">stdio.h</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">中还提供了一些与文件输入输出有关的函数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件结束检测函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> feof<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int feof</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">）；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">读文件时判断文件是否结束，如文件结束，则返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">，否则返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">读写文件出错检测函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> ferror<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数原型：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> int ferror(FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">功能：检查文件在用各种输入输出函数进行读写时是否出错，返回值为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">表示未出错，否则表示出错。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">删除文件函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> remove<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int remove(const
char *filename);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">功能：删除</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">filename</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">所指示的文件。如果指定的文件是被打开的，则不能被删除。如果删除成功则返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，否则返回非</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">重命名函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"> rename<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int rename(const
char *oldname,const char *newname);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">功能：将名为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">oldname</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">的文件重命名为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">newname</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。如果成功则返回</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">，否则返回非</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">0</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h3><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">随机文件存取</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">要在文件内部任意位置开始读写数据，可以移动文件内部的位置指针到需要读写的位置，再进行读写，这种读写称为随机读写。实现随机读写的关键是要按要求移动位置指针，称为文件的定位，文件定位函数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">rewind</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fseek</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">函数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Void rewind(FILE
*stream);<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">功能：把文件内部的位置指针移到文件之首。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Int fseek</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">FILE *stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">long
offset,int origin</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">功能：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">fseek</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">函数用来移动文件内部位置指针，其中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
12.0pt">stream</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">指向被移动的文件，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">offset</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是位移量，表示移动的字节数。当用常量表示位移量时，要求加后缀</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">L</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">origin</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">是起始位置，表示从何处开始计算位移量。规定的起始位置有三种：文件首、当前位置和文件尾。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">文件定位起始位置：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fseek</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";

"Times New Roman"">个字节处。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt">Fseek</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman"">可同时用于二进制文件和文本文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
